description: Describes the schema to be used by deserialised JSON Web Tokens.  Header not included (see RFC 7519)

email.description: The Rykan email associated with the account

permissions.description: List of Rykan permissions/roles the JWT allows for the user, such as accessible services and actions that can be performed

exp.description: Time in Unix time when the token expires

iat.description: Time in Unix time for when the token was issued
